name: Mango Farmers Club
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
What is the project about?
- The Mango Farmers Club (MFC) is a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) dedicated to promoting the adoption of Central Limit Order Book (CLOB) infrastructure on the Polygon zkEVM ecosystem.

What makes your project unique?
- MFC is the first community-owned meme token project for the Polygon zkEVM ecosystem.

What’s next for your project?
- MFC will encourage the adoption of CLOB infrastructure in Polygon zkEVM

What can your token be used for?
- Governance token for the Mango Farmers Club DAO
